engine

Class Connectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.Connectivity

  •  class Connectivity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for determining the connectivity of a Graph, including Kosaraju's algorithm.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Connectivity() 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static java.util.Stack<Node> dfs(Graph g)
      Method for returning all of the Nodes in a given graph in a Stack form representing the reverse of the order in which the Nodes finish, using dfs.
      private static void dfsVisit(Node src, java.util.Stack<Node> s, java.util.Set<Node> visited)
      Method for recursively visiting a given Node and all of its children.
      (package private) static java.util.Set<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> getSCC(Graph g)
      Method for returning the strongly connected components of a given Graph, using Kosaraju's algorithm.
